architectural_resources: AWS Lambda function (container image-based) (Dockerfile uses public.ecr.aws/lambda/python:3.11; handler in lambda_function.py)
Amazon ECR repository/image (README.md describes building/pushing to ECR; Dockerfile is a Lambda container image)
AWS IAM (lambda_function.py uses boto3 iam client: list_roles, list_policies)
AWS Organizations (lambda_function.py uses boto3 organizations client: list/describe service control policies)
GitHub repository + GitHub token/credentials (lambda_function.py clones/pushes to GitHub; README.md requires TF_VAR_GITHUB_TOKEN)
Outbound network access from Lambda to github.com (implied by git clone/push)
Ephemeral storage (/tmp) usage in Lambda (lambda_function.py clones repo into /tmp/<random>)
Event-driven scheduling likely via Amazon EventBridge (README.md references TF_VAR_EVENTBRIDGE_NAME)
S3 bucket likely for CloudTrail logs (README.md references TF_VAR_S3_BUCKET_NAME and TF_VAR_CLOUDTRAIL_NAME)
